When do we use the “static” keyword in java? Select all that apply.
incorrect_answers: For limiting fields to class level access only
explanation: Private (not static) is used such that a field is not accessible from non-child class of the same package. (Yes, we do use `static` to declare a class-level property or method. It’s a trick question:)
Packages are used to group classes and interfaces together.
question: What is a package in java?
correct_answers: Collection of related classes and interfaces which are bundled together.
incorrect_answers: Collection of related classes which are bundled together.
Collection of related interfaces which are bundled together.
Collection of related objects and classes which are bundled together.
